title: What Is Babel X And Why Is The FBI Using It? (Ep 1883)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking new allegation that the FBI is using advanced spyware to interfere in elections. 

News Picks:


What is BabelX and why is the FBI using it?


Soros Gave $17.6M to Leftist Group Pushing Facebook and TikTok to Censor So-Called Election Disinfo.

EXCLUSIVE: Migrant Caravans Are Preparing To Flood The US Border Ahead Of Midterms, Senior Guatemalan Official Warns.

FBI whistleblower reveals their cheat sheet for elections “crimes.”



Another disastrous GDP report about the US economy. 

An excellent explanation of how the two political parties shifted. 


The NY Times is panicking about the growth of Rumble and Truth Social. 


Our supplies of diesel are at near historic lows.
